title: Police make arrest in Downtown weekend shooting
content:
Metro Police arrested a man in connection with a Downtown Las Vegas shooting.
32-year-old Pierre Devlin was arrested without incident on Tuesday. He's accused of shooting two men and two women near 3rd Street and Ogden Avenue around 6:00 a.m. on May 29.
Devlin is charged with 5 counts of attempted murder, 4 counts of battery with a deadly weapon, 2 counts of discharging a firearm, and conspiracy to commit murder.
